remarks: A relationship between rank and ` R1 ` , clearly equivalent to ~ ssrankr1 and friends through trichotomy, but in Raph's opinion considerably more intuitive.  See ~ rankr1b for the subset version. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 29-May-2004.)
statement:
rankid.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
rankr1a $p |- ( B e. On -> ( A e. ( R1 ` B ) <-> ( rank ` A ) e. B ) ) $.
